name: pantheistic
content:

showing or holding a belief in many or all gods, or the belief that God exists in, and is the same as, all things, animals, and people within the universe: the pantheistic religions of the world The pantheistic approach to nature is that God is in everything. See
pantheism
More examplesFewer examplesThey have an almost pantheistic view of nature.Her work was later condemned for its pantheistic tendencies.He has an almost pantheistic sense of the "Absolute Unity" shared by God and his creation.
